tweaks.title: Hide "Related" Stories and Pages
tweaks.description: When you click a link from the news feed or Like a page post, Facebook inserts a block of other things you might like. Enable this Tweak to hide those blocks.

tweaks.title: Hide Notification Bubble
tweaks.description: When a new notification is added, it is displayed in the lower left corner. Enable this tweak to hide it.

tweaks.title: Force Chat Popup To Default Colors
tweaks.description: Chat colors can be customized by people in the chat, causing the popups to be different colors. This tweak restores all chat popup panels to the default blue color.

tweaks.title: Remove Status Background Colors
tweaks.description: Facebook users may choose a colored or image background for their posts.  This tweak removes the background and returns such posts to normal plain text.  Updated 2020-12-30, supports old & new layouts.

tweaks.title: Fix date-stamp blobs (TEMP FIX)
tweaks.description:
This is a TEMPORARY fix until a future update of Social Fixer.

Recent FB changes have caused Social Fixer to litter the News Feed with black (white in 'dark mode') date-stamp blobs.  Fixing this requires code changes.  For now, this tweak makes those blobs fade out after 5 seconds.

We know this is still irritating.  However, other parts of FB user interface use these blobs.  For instance, hovering who 'Liked' a post.  Making these blobs completely invisible would break parts of FB.
